Kapolri Idham Azis akan Langsung Kerja
01 Nov 2019, 12:28 by Pradipta Rahadi


Kapolri Idham Azis akan Langsung Kerja

KBRN, Jakarta : Kapolri Jend Polisi Idham Aziz menegaskan, dirinya akan tetap melanjutkan kerjasama antara Polri dan TNI demi menjaga keamanan Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia. Hal ini disampaikan Kapolri usai dilantik Presiden Joko Widodo di Istana Negara hari ini.Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia remi mendapat pimpinan baru. Adalah Jend Polisi Idham Aziz kini resmi menjabat sebagai Kapolri, usai dilantik Presiden Joko Widodo di Istana pada hari ini. Usai dilantik, Kapolri Jend Pol Idham Aziz mengatakan, dirinya akan tetap melanjutkan kerjasama antara Polri dan TNI demi menjaga keamanan Negara Kesatuan Republik Indonesia. Idham juga menjelaskan, bahwa dirinya mendapat amanah dari Presiden untuk langsung kerja. "Bersyukur dan terima kasih karena dipercaya oleh Bapak Presiden mengemban amanah ini sebagai Kapolri. Saya mau mengucapkan terima kasih juga ke Bapak Presiden yang telah memberikan kepercayaan ke saya untuk bekerja menjalaankan tugas sebagai Kapolri. Saya akan meningkatkan dan melaporkan pemantapan kerja sama dengan TNI untuk keamanan dan ketertiban masyarakat di seluruh Indonesia," ujar Kapolri di Istana Negara, Jumat (01/11/19). Sementara itu, ketika ditanya mengenai kelanjutan kasus Novel Baswedan, Kapolri tidak memberi jawaban. Karenanya, Kepala Divisi Humas Mabes Polri Irjen Pol M. Iqbal menjelaskan, bahwa penyelesaian kasus Novel akan terus diupayakan secara maksimal, dan dalam waktu dekat akan diungkap temuan signifikan yang belum dapat dikemukakan saat ini. "Ini adalah sistem secara organisatoris, Kapolri tetap jabatan yang secara sistemik melakukan pekerjaan yang ada, tugas dan tangggung jawab sesuai dengan job description-nya, sehingga kalo ada pergantian ya terus jalan, bukan kepada person tapi kepada pekerjaan. Sehingga Pak kapolri baru sudah sampaikan bahwa dia akan perintahkan Kabareskrim baru yang akan ditunjuk dalam waktu dekat, dan dia perintahkan ke kabareskrim baru untuk menuntaskan kasus Novel Baswedan,” jelas M. Iqbal kepada wartawan di Istana Negara.   Adapun untuk jabatan Kabareskrim, Irjen Pol M.Iqbal menyatakan, bahwa penunjukan Kabareskrim menjadi kewenangan dan Hak Prerogatif penuh Kapolri Jend Pol Idham Aziz. Meski demikian, ada dua nama yang kuat yang akan menjadi pengganti Idham di Bareskrim, yaitu Irjen Listyo Sigit Prabowo dan Irjen gatot Eddy Pramono.

National Police Chief Idham Azis will immediately work
Nov 01 2019, 12:28 by Pradipta Rahadi


National Police Chief Idham Azis will immediately work

KBRN, Jakarta: National Police Chief Gen. Idham Aziz stressed that he will continue to work together between the Indonesian National Police and the TNI to maintain the security of the Unitary Republic of Indonesia. This was conveyed by the National Police Chief after being sworn in by President Joko Widodo at the State Palace today. The Republic of Indonesia State Police is playing hard to get a new leadership. Is the Police General Idham Aziz now officially served as National Police Chief, after being sworn in by President Joko Widodo at the Palace today. After being inaugurated, National Police Chief Gen. Idham Aziz said he would continue to work together between the Indonesian National Police and the TNI to maintain the security of the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia. Idham also explained, that he got the mandate from the President to directly work. "Gratitude and gratitude for being trusted by the President to carry out this mandate as the National Police Chief. I would also like to thank the President who gave me the confidence to work on fulfilling his duties as the National Police Chief. I will improve and report on strengthening cooperation with the TNI for security and public order throughout Indonesia, "said the National Police Chief at the State Palace, Friday (01/11/19). Meanwhile, when asked about the continuation of the Baswedan Novel case, the National Police Chief did not give an answer. Therefore, the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters Inspector General of Police M. Iqbal explained, that the settlement of the Novel case will continue to be maximally pursued, and in the near future will be revealed significant findings that cannot be stated at this time. "This is an organizational system, the National Police Chief remains a position that systematically performs the existing work, duties and responsibilities in accordance with his job description, so that if there is a change, then continue, not to the person but to the job. So that the new Chief of Police has conveyed "He will order a new Kabareskrim to be appointed in the near future, and he will order a new Kabareskrim to resolve the Baswedan Novel case," M. Iqbal explained to reporters at the State Palace. Kabareskrim becomes the full authority and prerogative of the National Police Chief Gen. Idham Aziz, but there are two strong names that will replace Idham in Bareskrim, namely Inspector General Listyo Sigit Prabowo and Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono.
